text: <!channel> Walmart/Sams emailed me this morning asking if we could give them a list of topics/questions that you would be interested in having answered by a panel of Sr. Directors/Vice Presidents.  The panel will be made up of BYU alum (not all MBA alum).  Please submit your topics/questions on this thread.  I will be submitting them tomorrow at noon.  Thank you.
